module.name: Virtual Queue Plus
module.description: MODULE REQUIRES A LICENSE FOR IT TO FUNCTION. Please visit www.schmoozecom.com/oss.php. Provides Virtual Queues, adds additional advanced features to Queues module, adds ability to configure Queue Rules
module.changelog: *2.11.1.23* Use more reliable method of restarting daemon on install. *2.11.1.21* Add Virtual Queues to queue list in Queue Callback *2.11.1.20* Add announcement option to Queue Callback *2.11.1.17* Skinning fixes *2.11.1.15* New prompts from Allison *2.11.1.10* Sales cleanup *2.11.1.7* Use correct ::create() call to avoid future issues. *2.11.1.6* Fix issue with vqplus and FreePBX 12 relating to lazymembers *2.11.1.4/5* #PBXAC-11 *2.11.1.3* Fix lazymembers *2.11.1.2* if missing label kills additional customers hitting queue *2.11.1.1* FREEPBX-6703 clear vq channel variables after hitting a queue *2.11.1.0* adds Auto-Unpause If Life feature *2.11.0.3* don't report optional destinations as errors when not set *2.11.0.2* Add to FreePBX Repos *2.11.0.0beta2.5* Mark as beta *2.11.0.0beta2.2* Packaging of ver 2.11.0.0beta2.3 *2.11.0.0beta2.1* Packaging of ver 2.11.0.0beta2.1 *2.11.0.0beta2.0* Initial testing release
